ai-patthana18.10:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.10:3.1_0: Experiential causes cause not reason for the sake of something or cause,
ai-patthana18.10:3.1_1: And it is the reason why these five objects have passed away. ...
ai-patthana18.10:3.1_2: the five spirits with each other.
ai-patthana18.10:3.1_5: the five hindrances are not clear.
